page.title: 05Shopping Questionnaire Data.
page.content: The following points emerged from a 'shopping' questionnaire distributed in Mattishall on July 10th.1985. Most people questioned use the local shops,but prefer to use larger stores in Norwich or Dereham for their major,weekly shopping.The baker and butcher are the most used local shops. Many people use the village shops every day for small requirements.The small Spar and Mace supermarkets have the best choice of groceries and the most competitive prices,but the majority of those questioned prefer to buy groceries in the larger town super- or hyper-markets.However,almost all agreed that the assistants in the village shops are more helpful and polite than their counterparts in town or city.Many people expressed the desire to see a chemist's shop opened in Mattishall.
